resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keys and Scales are Sets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Befestigt und Skalen sind Sets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduit et les échelles sont des 
positionnements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fecha à chave e as escalas são jogos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imposta e le scale sono insiemi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πλήκτρα και οι κλίμακες είναι σύνολα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Afina y las escalas son conjuntos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An activity for grades 4-8 that use musical keys and scales to give students a chance to practice identifying sets and intersections of sets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aktivität für Grade 4-8, die musikalische 
Tasten und Skalen benutzen, um Kursteilnehmern eine Wahrscheinlichkeit
zu geben Sets, und Durchschnitte der Sets zu kennzeichnen zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité pour les catégories 4-8 qui 
emploient des clés musicales et des échelles pour donner à des 
étudiants une chance de pratiquer identifier des positionnements et 
des intersections des positionnements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade para as classes 4-8 que usam chaves 
musicais e escalas dar a estudantes uma possibilidade praticar 
identificar jogos e interseções dos jogos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività per i gradi 4-8 che usano i tasti 
musicali e le scale per dare ad allievi una probabilità esercitarsi 
in identificare gli insiemi e le intersezioni degli insiemi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα για τους βαθμούς 4-8 που 
χρησιμοποιούν τα μουσικές πλήκτρα και τις κλίμακες για να δώσουν 
στους σπουδαστές μια πιθανότητα στην πρακτική που προσδιορίζει τα 
σύνολα και τις διατομές των συνόλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad para los grados 4-8 que utilizan 
claves musicales y escalas para dar a estudiantes una ocasión de 
practicar el identificar de conjuntos y de intersecciones de 
conjuntos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104094</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>

  </manifestation>
